title: Media (Audio-visual presentation)
summary: The term media (more accurately, multimedia) refers to audio, video, or combined audio-visual material such as music, recorded speech, movies, TV shows, or any other form of content that is presented over a period of time.

parents.title: MDN Web Docs Glossary: Definitions of Web-related terms
